Have you created Ant via bootstrap?

I've seen messages like this, when I compile parts of Ant with jdk's javac and
parts with jikes.  Make sure, you don't set build.compiler in .antrc and
re-bootstrap Ant, that should make the error go away.

BTW, Gump builds Velocity just fine with 1.5beta.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
deves@spotlife.com
text:
looks like jikes was the reason. My ant was built at somepoint using jikes 
(I had an .ant.properties with build.compiler=jikes)

After a fresh build of ant sans .ant.properties, my compile of velocity 
completes successfully. 

That will teach me not to follow off-hand comments in properties files.
